Indian Economy.title: A consumption-driven economy can’t do without rapid income growth
Indian Economy.summary: India’s economic expansion hinges on household income and job security to a considerable extent. It’s critical to address weaknesses on these fronts. Else, we’ll find it hard to get growth roaring on all cylinders.
